table.name: vtiger_bhsagentassignment
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsagentassignment` ( `bhsagentassignmentid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsagentassignment_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsagentassignmentid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsagentassignmentcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsagentassignmentcf` ( `bhsagentassignmentid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsagentassignmentid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
